response.overview: While Sidney Prescott and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.
response.tagline: The most terrifying scream is always the last.
response.title: Scream 3

cast.name: Wes Craven
cast.character: Man with Video Camera on Studio Tour (uncredited)

release_dates.note: Dead by Dawn Horror Film Festival
